query: Poppy Kids pediatric dentistry Novato CA usa
name: Poppy Kids Pediatric Dentistry

posts.body: Join us for a delightful day of gardening and fun at the Poppy Planting Party! Get your hands dirty planting beautiful poppies and unleash your creativity by decorating a pot to take home. This family-friendly event welcomes all children to experience the joy of nature. Don’t miss out on this blooming good time!

Join Us for a Delightful Morning!!! 

🌟 Mom's Morning Out with Poppy Kids & The Mom Walk Collective
📅 Saturday, January 27th @ 9:30 am
📍 Where: Poppy Kids Pediatric Dentistry (450 Ignacio Blvd. Novato CA 94949 - Within Pacheco Plaza)

Join us for a heartwarming adventure at our Valentine's Day Card Making Event! 💌✂️ On February 11th, from 11 AM to 2 PM, little hands and big imaginations will come together to craft the cutest, most love-filled cards in town. With glitter galore, stacks of colorful paper, and endless stickers, your child's creativity can soar. Perfect for families and kids of all ages – let's spread some love and make some memories! 💖 All children welcome!

reviews_data.review_text:
The most welcoming clinic hands down!
Ashley is there to greet you and help answer any questions, she engages your children and makes them feel welcomed and comfortable. When you call for an apt. Ashley makes sure she writes down everything to make the experience smooth for you and your little, they are open and happy to accommodate to your childs needs! Dr. Andrea is a skilled and caring Dentist, my son was excited for his first apt and Dr.Andrea made his experience unforgettable. She was patient and informative with my son allowing him to understand the tools and procedures being done is safe and important. If your looking for a safe and kind pediatric dentistry, look no further and bring your little ones to Poppy Dentistry!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so very much for such a thoughtful and kind review! We love what we do and making dentistry fun for all of our patients- we are so happy that you and your family had such a great experience! Thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: Dr Andrea and her team are simply amazing! They made my toddler feel right at home. I would highly recommend to anyone looking to find a client that is welcoming, carrying and invested in your child’s health & happiness!

If you're searching for the perfect dental office to bring your children, look no further! Dr. Andrea's practice is an absolute gem. From the moment you step inside, the warm and welcoming atmosphere envelops you, ensuring both you and your little ones feel right at home.

Dr. Andrea herself is a beacon of kindness and knowledge. Her dedication to educating children about proper dental care is commendable. She doesn't just treat teeth; she empowers kids to embrace healthy habits that will last a lifetime.

My children adore visiting Dr. Andrea's office, and as a parent, I couldn't be happier with the care they receive. In a world where exceptional service is rare, Dr. Andrea and her team shine brightly. This review truly deserves more stars than I can give!

Dr.Andrea is phenomenal. I’ve tried a couple of other pediatric dentists in Marin County, and she is by far the most professional and kind. She truly cares about my child and his well being. She’s thorough, and will take her time with both my toddler and to answer all the questions I have for her. She’s truly amazing and I highly recommend her. My toddler loves going to see Dr. Andrea! The staff are also kind, friendly and super accommodating. The office space is beautiful, clean, kid friendly but also aesthetically pleasing. If you are looking for a place to take your kids, run don’t walk!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this kind and thoughtful review, Gianira! We love seeing you and your family as well! Thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: Our first dental visit ever was so great - Dr. Andrea is wonderful and warm. They explained everything really carefully to my daughter and they made it very fun. The office is also very clean, warm, and nicely appointed. Our daughter felt safe and was very cooperative! Thumbs up!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Alia, for your review! We are so happy that you had such a great experience here. Our goal is always to make dentistry fun!

reviews_data.review_text:
Honestly, just blown away at our experience here!!! I almost chose another local pediatric dentist for our boy, but something told me this place would be the one we love. We brought our son for his 1Year checkup and we are so thankful to have such a great team here. The level of care, compassion, and attention to detail is just so special.

When they first met our boy, they remembered he liked Mickey Mouse and asked if it was okay to play Mickey Mouse Clubhouse on the TV in the baby room to help him settle in and be more comfortable. I LOVED this. He also got a great goody bag of products, (so did mom!!- extra bonus!), he got to pick a toy out at the end, and we even received the sweetest welcome letter in the mail after our visit with a Mickey Mouse sticker!

Aside from the great level of care, is the great eye the doctor has. She noticed several things on our boy I didn’t even think of mentioning, but she recognized it and brought them to my attention and I loved that. These were very small details that can easily be missed but they weren’t.

I cannot recommend this practice enough. They are wonderful. Thank you, Poppy Kids!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Ashlyn, thank you so much for this detailed and incredibly thoughtful review. It truly means so much to us! We are so happy we were able to give you an amazing experience, we are so thankful for you and your family!

reviews_data.review_text: Dr.Andrea and her team are the best. From the moment you walk in to the office you are greeted with a smile! It was my sons first dentist appointment and she was so sweet and welcoming, made sure all my questions were answered and informed me on all I need to know to set my boy up for success when it comes to his teeth! She took her time and gave us all her attention and time. I love not feeling rushed at a medical appointment, what a breath of fresh air! We LOVE Poppy kids!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Sara, Thank you so much for this incredible review! You and your son are what makes our job so much fun! We really appreciate you joining us in creating happy dental memories! Thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: I have 4 kids ages 3-10 and Dr Andrea knows how to charm them all at once. She is responsible, communicative, kind, encouraging, honest and straightforward. They LOVE their dental visits and I’m so grateful to have found Poppy!

Dr. Andrea and everyone at Poppy Kids Pediatric Dentistry is wonderful. They are so friendly and have made our few first toddler dentist experiences awesome! Would give them more stars if possible!!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this amazing review! We are so happy that you had such great dental experiences, thank you for helping us make dentistry fun!

reviews_data.review_text:
Took my two year old for a visit and it was a great experience! Office was bright, cheery, modern and welcoming, as was the staff. They were very accommodating for children with screens on the ceiling to play Disney+ during the cleaning and prizes from the toy chest and stickers after we were done. Dr Andrea was very patient and did a great job educating me on goals and expectations for oral hygiene as a parent to a young child.

The first appointment for kids under three is free and after that they have a membership plan that can offer savings on all of the annual checkups for the year. Our dental insurance covers very few local practices, so this is a great way to save for those with limited or no dental insurance.

I can see this being our dental home :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Natalie for such a thoughtful and kind review. We are so lucky to have you at Poppy! Thank you for helping us make dentistry fun!

reviews_data.review_text: We love Dr. Andrea! She is so patient, gentle, kind, and informative with our 3 year old’s dental care. The office is clean, modern, and kid friendly. Everyone we have met on the staff has been a delight and we are so happy to have such a great pediatric dentist in Novato!
If you are looking for a dentist for your Kid, look no further. Dr. Andrea and her team are the best.  My 4 yr old LOVES coming to the dentist. They offer a great in house dental plan too!

We had a great experience at Poppy Kids. After an unsuccessful dental cleaning attempt with our 2yr old at our family dentist, they referred to Dr. Andrea. She was amazing! Dr. Andrea was able to do a full cleaning on our son and a proper full dental check up. The office has TVs on the ceiling, play area, iPads and stickers- they’ve got it all! If you have kids, I highly recommend Poppy Kids.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Jennifer for this incredible review! We are so happy you had such a great experience at our office! Thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: Our entire experience was absolutely wonderful. Dr Aduna takes such great care of my children. She thoroughly explained each procedure and she made my children feel so safe and welcome. The office is such a beautiful environment, it’s clean and cozy, and has the perfect touch for children of all ages to enjoy their dental experience. As a Dental, professional, myself, I can confidently and highly recommend Poppy kids Pediatric Dental.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Dr. Bales for this incredible review and for bringing your kids to see us at Poppy. Its experiences like this that makes our jobs so much fun! Thank you and we can't wait to see you guys again!

reviews_data.review_text: We brought our 18 month old son for his first dentist appointment to Dr. Andrea and everything was great! While we waited, we were offered water, coffee, etc. and then once ready, we were given a brief tour of the office and then sat down with Dr. Andrea. She did a ~2 minute mouth check, but the rest of the appointment was to go over any concerns and discuss proper dental hygiene in toddlers. At the end, we were given a goodie bag of dental products and a toy for a son to pick out. Everyone was super friendly and the office was very modern and clean! Overall, we had a great first dentist experience with our son at Poppy Kids!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Molly, thank you so much for this incredible review! We were so happy to see you and your son. Our goal is to always make dentistry fun and its families like yours that can help us make that happen! We appreciate you so much!

reviews_data.review_text: Dr. Andrea, Ashley and Nicole are the best of the best at what they do. Dare I say, my kids love going to the dentist. Thank you Poppy Kids!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Renae! We appreciate you and your family so much and always have such a great time with you all!

reviews_data.review_text:
My kids (and I) love Dr. Andrea and her staff. They are the most welcoming, gentle & respectful people. One of my kids is anxious and they are so creative & supportive with them that they settle pretty easily. The office is really comfortable, nicely decorated and spotless. Kids love the prizes!
Not enough stars!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Jessica, thank you so much for this incredible review! We are so happy to have your kids as patients! Thank you so much and Happy New Year!

reviews_data.review_text: Attentive, friendly, kind and detailed service. Dr. Andrea is very sweet and chatty really helping make the little ones (and parents) feel welcome. Our children enjoyed their visit and look forward to returning. The office is really beautiful and well-organised. Assistant was calm and steady which was helpful. The receptionist is very efficient and welcoming. I love that they provide itemised receipts and details when booking for various treatments and procedures. Lovely relaxing experience. Highly recommend for families!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this kind and detailed review! We were so happy to welcome you and your family to our practice. Thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: My toddler had her first dentist visit here and was soothed from the start with a friendly welcome and a colorful lobby area. Everything went so well that she is still plying “dentist” at home and loves her new dental swag. She even let Dr. Andrea brush and floss her teeth and she’s not even three! Thank you to the whole Poppy Kids team for making our experience so positive!
Brought my child in for his first dentist appointment and he had such a blast. The team at Poppy Kids Pediatric Dentistry is extremely friendly and helpful. The dental office setup is very neat.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Irina, for such a thoughtful and kind review. We are so happy that you had such a great time! We appreciate you and your family so much!

reviews_data.review_text:
Who knew the dentist could be SO FUN?!

I brought my two-year-old and four-year-old for a check up. Poppy recently hosted a community event, and I found out that kids under three are free!

From the moment we walked in to the moment we left, the staff were so kind, welcoming and supportive. Here's what we loved most:

1) the facility is absolutely gorgeous! Everything is brand new, and they thought of everything, including a little kids lounge in the back area, and a TV screen on the ceiling for kids to watch their favorite movies while they get their check up! My son was so excited!!

2) so efficient! Dr. Andrea is incredible and was able to assess both of my kids. Dental needs in a matter of minutes.

3) so accommodating! The staff here go above, and beyond to make kids feel comfortable, and they have thought of every detail, including a goodie bag at the end to get them, excited about their dental routine, and a prize basket which my kids went crazy for

4) very patient! My son was super tentative about the dentist and has a strong, gag reflex, but Dr. Andrea made him feel so comfortable and went at his pace.

We will most definitely be back and can't wait for our next appointment! My son was talking about the dentist all night long after we left 🤣

My only suggestion is that they put some kids toys in the waiting room since I had to fill out paperwork for two kids while trying to keep them from getting into everything at the same time. I also think it might be helpful to consolidate some of the information that they ask for in the paperwork to speed up the first time check in process.

Andrea and team are so friendly & accommodating to my little ones! They go above & beyond to ensure I have the tools I need to keep my kids building good hygiene habits at home and answer any questions I may have. They make going to the dentist something to look forward to ❤️
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this incredible review, Haley! We truly enjoy seeing you and your family as well! Thank you so much for helping us make dentistry fun!

reviews_data.review_text: Dr. Andrea, Nicole and Ashley are simply the best! They make sure your kiddos feel at home and comfortable. You will get the best care with Poppy Kids!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Tiffany, thank you so much for this amazing and thoughtful review! We always enjoy seeing you! Thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: Had my babies first dentist appointment there and it was amazing! They know how to make going to the dentist a fun experience for kids and parents. Friendliest staff ever, just all around the perfect dentist for kids.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this amazing review, Lizzie! We are so happy you had such a great experience at Poppy!

reviews_data.review_text: Dr Andrea and Ashley in the front were so kind and amazing ! Ashley was very kind to my son for it being his first time. Dr Andrea made sure we were comfortable and were place in a setting that was cozy for my son ! Love this place for being my sons first dentist visit! A milestone and memory I wil never forget !
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this wonderful review! We are so happy you had such a great experience, it means to much to us to create positive dental memories! Thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: My daughter got sealants on her teeth today. We had tried a few years ago unsuccessfully with a different dentist but today it was a total breeze. Dr. Andrea explained everything that she was going to do before she did it and constantly checked in with my daughter during the process. The entire staff is so friendly and accommodating and has totally changed our experience into a positive one with going to the dentist. It used to be all tears but now with Poppy Kids it is all smiles! We highly recommend Poppy Kids!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this amazing review Annie! You guys are so much fun- thank you for making dentistry fun for everyone! All smiles for the win!

reviews_data.review_text: From the first call with Ms Ashely to the actual visit with Dr Andrea, our experience has been great. My son is inquisitive and wants to know what everything is & the staff made him feel so comfortable. This office will come highly recommended from our family to future patients :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this review and bringing your son to Poppy Kids! We are so happy you all had such a great experience!

reviews_data.review_text: 10/10 first dentist experience for my 1 year old. The staff is so friendly and great with kids. The office itself is beautiful, clean and designed with kids in mind.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this amazing review, Nina! We are so happy that your first visit was so great- thank you for helping us make dentistry fun!

reviews_data.review_text: Love Dr. Andrea! My kids enjoy coming to the dentist. She has a great rapport with both children and it's relaxing for this mom as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Kristin for your review! It truly means so much to us that you have had such relaxing/good experiences here! Thank you so much!

reviews_data.review_text: So thankful I found Poppy Kids Dentistry for my two little ones! Not only is the office beautiful and new, but the entire team is fantastic and made my daughter feel comfortable. I highly recommend!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this incredible review! We were so happy to meet you guys and having so much fun with us!

reviews_data.review_text: I have a 2.5 and 4.5 year old and took them both to see Dr. Andrea and it was a great experience! Her office is beautiful and cheery, her staff was kind and helpful. Dr. Andrea was thorough, easy to talk to and made my kids feel special and they actually enjoyed the whole experience. I definitely recommend Poppy Kids!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this incredible review! We are so appreciative, but most importantly, are so happy you that you and your kids had such a great experience! We always strive for great dental visits! Thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: I was impressed with the entire experience. It’s a bright and fun environment. Everyone was so helpful, kind, and friendly. Dr. Andrea was all of that and more. She is very smart, matter of fact, communicative and warm. Moreover, she did an incredible job at making the experience as comfortable as it could be for my 4 year old and 2 year old, all while giving total quality care. They’ve really nailed it in terms of making a visit to the dentist least intimidating as possible for kids.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Hannah, for the review! Our goal is always to create a fun dental experience and we are so happy we succeeded! We can't wait to see you again and have some more fun!

reviews_data.review_text: Today I took my daughter to Poppy Kids Pediatric Dentistry for her first dental visit and it was an amazing experience. Dr. Andrea and every member of the team were incredibly friendly and welcoming, making my daughter feel comfortable and at ease. They were great with her, explaining each step of the process and answering all of my questions (even before the visit). The office is also very clean and new, and the waiting area is very comfortable. Overall, I would highly recommend Poppy Kids Pediatric Dentistry to any parent looking for a great pediatric dentist. My daughter loved her first visit and can't wait to go back! Thank you so much!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this incredible review, Alexandra! It was so amazing to meet you and your daughter. We are so happy that she had such a great time! We are so grateful for you, so thank you so much!

reviews_data.review_text: We love Poppy and everyone there! We have had the most positive experiences on our visits. Such a great place- very welcoming and comfortable for little ones!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Louisa, for your kind and thoughtful review. We are so happy you had such a positive experience here! Thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: This is THE BEST kids dentist ever! The staff and dentist are exceptional in every way! So happy I get to have my kids go here! ❤️❤️❤️❤️
reviews_data.owner_answer: Betsy! Thank you so much for such an incredible review- you and your kids always brighten our day! Your happy experiences really mean the world to us. Thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: I am so impressed with Poppy Dental! The office is super cute and inviting. My boys can’t wait to go and today my 8 year old son had 4 sealants and a rather large filling on his back molar. In the past (with other dental offices who specialize in sensory issues with kids) we had to put him completely out to work on his teeth because he has a lot of anxiety but Dr. Andrea Aduna was amazing. So patient and kind and explained each step. She gave him breaks when he needed it so it was a positive experience. Their staff is so friendly and helpful! Reasonably priced! I highly recommend everyone to take their kids here.  I don’t go out of my way to write reviews but when I’m super impressed I will. This office deserves a 10 star rating!!! Thank you so much!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this incredible review! We were so happy to give your kids happy dental experiences! They truly make our days and are the reason why we love what we do. So, thank you!!

reviews_data.review_text: We had such a wonderfully positive, gentle experience with Dr. Andrea and her staff. Every single person was friendly, patient, warm and took time to make sure our children were comfortable throughout our entire visit. They have curated a beautiful, child-friendly space which was soothing for both parents and kiddos. The Poppy Kids staff went above and beyond to answer insurance questions and followed up with us at various touch-points to ensure we had an excellent experience. Our son raved about how much he LOVED the dentist for days after his visit —can you believe it?!  Poppy Kids really is a gem — recommend them wholeheartedly.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow! Thank you so much for such a thoughtful and incredible review. We are so thankful for you and your family!

reviews_data.review_text: Today was our first visit to Poppy and the treatment we received from the minute we stepped into their business was exceptional. The staff is so friendly and they did everything possible to make us feel welcomed, especially the lady working the front desk. The Dentist was so comforting with our children and she really made them feel at home. You're the best, Poppy Pediatric Dentistry!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Domonick for your incredible review! We were so happy to meet you and your family and helping us make dentistry fun! Thank you again, we appreciate you all so much!

reviews_data.review_text: I wish I (as an adult) could sit in the chair of Poppy Kids, the entire experience from our first visit and basic cleaning to some pretty substantial extractions, has been phenomenal!  All kids have a different level of comfort when it comes to having someone working in their mouths but the patience, grace, consideration of time and comfort to just overall being a super cool team of people has been really incredible. I cannot say enough good things…because there are many more… if you are looking for a dentist for your children, I highly recommend the Poppy Team!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Natalie thank you so much for this incredible review! We are truly so happy that you and your kids have had such positive dental experiences. It's families like yours that prove that dentistry is fun! Thank you so much!

reviews_data.review_text: We had a great experience at Poppy’s! After a few years at another dentist with a pretty poor experience I knew we needed to change or my 6 year old would be scarred for life. I took my almost 2 year old and 6 year old….no tears from either and the staff was so kind and patient and made them feel comfortable every step of the way! I am so happy we found Poppy’s and highly recommend
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this amazing review! We are so thankful for you and your family!

reviews_data.review_text: We have had wonderful experiences with Dr. Andrea at Poppy Kids! She put my daughter at ease during what was a very frightening experience (falling and breaking a permanent tooth!). She was reassuring, answered questions, and took time to make sure my daughter was comfortable throughout the visit. Not only is Dr. Andrea wonderful, the entire staff is so incredibly warm, friendly, and welcoming. They are kind to each other and make an excellent team - the kind of dynamic that undoubtedly makes their work the best. Thank you, all!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your incredible review! We truly loved meeting you! Having patients like your child bring so much joy to our everyday. So, thank you! We appreciate you so much!

reviews_data.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this place! I wish they were around when I was a kid. They just made my daughters dental experience as amazing as possible. She went from being scared at the other dentist office to now looking forward to going to see everyone at Poppy. I highly recommend to anyone and everyone!!!! They deserve way more than 5 stars.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow! Thank you so much for your review- we are so incredibly grateful for you and your daughter! Thank you so much for helping us make dentistry FUN! :)

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing experience. Staff is super friendly and welcoming. Dr. Andrea is great at explaining things to kids and moves slowly to make sure the kids are comfortable. Her tooth brushing chart has really helped our daughter!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the review and for coming to our practice. We are so happy that you all had such a great experience! Happy dental experiences bring us so much joy. Thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: What a wonderful experience! Dr. Andrea and her assistant Nicole were great. This was my sons first dental visit and it was fantastic! Dr. Andrea made us feel welcome as soon as we walked in the door, got our appointment started right away (I had done all the paperwork before my appointment at home via patient portal). Dr. Andrea walked Cooper through the steps of what she would be doing so that he wasn’t afraid. Cooper was very happy after and ended our visit with a high five and knuckles.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Meaghan! We loved being apart of your sons first dental visit! Our goal is for everyone to leave happy and we can't wait to do high fives again! You guys are amazing!

reviews_data.review_text: We love Dr Andrea!! I took my kids to see her a few days ago, and they’re already asking when we can go back.  They don’t wanna wait another 6 months for their cleanings!!  She’s upbeat, fun and super knowledgeable. The office is beautiful, clean and state of the art. Her staff is so helpful and kind. They really treat you like family there. Go see Dr Andrea and her team, you won’t regret it!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Stacy for such an incredible review! We truly enjoyed seeing you! Thanks again!

reviews_data.review_text:
A+++
Poppy Kids is wonderful! Beautiful office, friendly staff, no waiting, very efficient appointment, awesome doctor. My kid loved it. Just wish they saw adult patients here :) Highly recommend!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Anne! Thank you so much for your thoughtful and incredible review! We truly loved meeting you and we are so happy your son had such a great experience! It's truly why we are here- to create happy dental experiences! Thank you again!

reviews_data.review_text: Always a wonderful experience at Poppy Kids! It’s not just a dental appointment, it’s like being part of a caring community that puts everyone’s stress at ease. My kids actually look forward to going to the dentist now. We feel blessed to have found Dr. Andrea and her amazing team. 💗
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Nadia! We are always so happy to see you and your family. You all make dentistry fun! Thanks again!

reviews_data.review_text: First off, this office is so beautiful, simple, and clean! Dr. Andrea and her assistant Nicole were so welcoming and personable. I brought my 2 year old daughter in for her fist visit and they made her feel right at home. Dr. Andrea showed my daughter all of her tools and made sure she was 100% comfortable before starting anything. Carter loved picking out her prize at the end and we left with a goody bag full of dental care. What a wonderful experience, we can't wait to come back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Kendall, thank you so much for such an amazing review, but most importantly for bringing Carter in to our office! She is literally the reason why we built Poppy Kids and we truly loved seeing you! Can't wait to see you again!

reviews_data.review_text: Lovely people here! Ashley welcomed us and offered drinks, and ipad for the kid (if we allow it of course). Dr Andrea was very kind with my daughter and took it slow with her as it was her first ever dentist visit. She helped navigate the process and answered questions that we had. And finally gave us a lil goodie bag and let my daughter choose a toy to bring home. Thank you for the pleasant experience!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for such a kind and thoughtful review! We were so happy to see you and your family and that her first dental visit was great! Thank you so much!

reviews_data.review_text: We have had the best experience with Poppy Kids Dentistry! Dr. Aduna is fantastic - she is knowledgeable, thorough, gentle, and kind. The office is beautiful and staff is wonderful. This practice unmatched and is the new gold standard for pediatric dentistry in Marin.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow, Megan, thank you so much for this incredible review! It was so amazing meeting you and your family, we appreciate you all so much! Thank you for helping us make dentistry FUN!
